meanings.definition: To secretly listen to or record conversations
meanings.sent1: I heard they were bugging the office to catch any leaks.
meanings.sent2: The detective was bugging the suspect's phone to gather evidence.
meanings.sent3: The spies were bugging the room, trying to be sneaky.
meanings.sent4: The wiretap was bugging the conversation like a nosy eavesdropper.
meanings.sent5: The hidden microphone was bugging the room, capturing every word spoken.
